decision_conditions: The extension permitted shall not be used or occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 14 Sandringham Road, Northolt, UB5 5HN.  REASON:	To ensure that the character of the area is preserved and a separate dwelling is not created, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B1, B5, H11, Replacement UDP Policies 4.1, 5.6. | No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.  REASON:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B1, B5, ES6, H33, Replacement UDP Policies 4.1, 5.5.
description: Retention of ground floor rear extension to house
